title: Estimating the National and Local Prevalence of Problem Drug Misuse in Scotland
abstract: This report outlines the results of the third national study funded by the Scottish Government to provide estimates of the prevalence of problem drug misuse in Scotland. The estimates refer to the calendar year 2006
